snippet: BROWN--Dr. Roscoe C.,Jr. The Board and Staff of The New York Botanical Garden are saddened by the passing of our esteemed Trustee Emeritus, Roscoe C. Brown, Jr., Ph.D. Dr. Brown was a longtime and active member of our Board of Trustees, particular...
lead_paragraph: BROWN--Dr. Roscoe C.,Jr. The Board and Staff of The New York Botanical Garden are saddened by the passing of our esteemed Trustee Emeritus, Roscoe C. Brown, Jr., Ph.D. Dr. Brown was a longtime and active member of our Board of Trustees, particularly during his years as President of Bronx Community College. A steadfast member of the Botanical Garden family, he always stood at the ready to help in any way he could. His thrilling presentation at the Garden about his career as a Tuskegee Airman will ever remain a cherished memory for the community. We extend our sincere condolences to his family. Maureen K. Chilton, Chairman of the Board Gregory Long, President The New York Botanical Garden 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BROWN, DR. ROSCOE C.
